channel.title: How do I change the background of my client?
channel.description:
Hey I was just wondering how you change the background of my client its a 317.
Please reply Thanks! ^.^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2009, 05:50:22 pm[/size][hr]If this will help, I am using Codyscape v2

item.title: How do I change the background of my client?
item.dc:creator: @dots dots
item.description:
@dots wrote:

look for a folder called “spirts” or “sprites”, then open that up and look for the SAME picture in the folder you just opened up t that appears when you run the client. once you found it right click and click edit. Paint will open up and you can make your changes. save compile and your good =][

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the background of my client?

item.title: How do I change the background of my client?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

There should be a .png file in the client root, you delete that and put in whatever picture you want, but using the same name.

Read full topic
